q: Nielsen said an even steeper ratings drop of 18 percent...` American Idol' season 10 premiere ratings tank The big question when judge Simon Cowell announced he would not be returning to American Idol for season 10 was, What will the dynamic be like at the judges' table without him? Apparently many regular viewers didn't really care about the answer.
